title: Graded HOFers for sale/trade - including a couple rare backs
author: bounce

posts.post_title: Graded HOFers for sale/trade - including Cobb and Wajo Old Mills
posts.post_content:
Making these available, for sale or for trade.  Also have a thread in the "E" section with some nice mid/low grade Cracker Jacks.

Prices are net to me and include shipping (unless you're in Canada, please reach out first), if you're not comfortable with PP F&F then please add 3% for the fee.

I've listed a few things below I'd be interested in trading for as well.  I'm really only interested in HOFers.

PM or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url].  Happy to provide additional scans including backs on request.

Ty Cobb red portrait Old Mill - PSA 5 - $PENDING
Walter Johnson portrait Piedmont 350 - BVG 5 - $PENDING
Walter Johnson pitching Old Mill - SGC 60 - $PENDING
Johnny Evers Chicago on shirt Old Mill (one of 4 highest graded) - PSA 5 - $PENDING
Cy Young glove showing Piedmont 350 - SGC 5.5 - $OLD


***In terms of trade, below are a few cards/players I am interested in (need to be graded, no raw cards):
N162 Goodwin Cap Anson
N162 Goodwin King Kelly
N300 Mayos Plug Cap Anson
T205 Christy Mathewson PSA 4+
T206 Ty Cobb Bat Off PSA 4+
E95 Philadelphia Caramels:
- Ty Cobb PSA 4+
- Eddie Plank
1914 Cracker Jacks:
- Ty Cobb
- Walter Johnson
- Tris Speaker
- Nap Lajoie
- Other 1914 Cracker Jack HOFers
T206, Portraits preferred:
Walter Johnson PSA 4+
Christy Mathewson PSA 4+
Cy Young PSA 4+
Nap Lajoie PSA 4+
Tris Speaker PSA 5+
1933 Goudey Babe Ruth (any pose)
1933 Goudey Lou Gehrig
1939 Play Ball Joe DiMaggio
1939 Play Ball Ted Williams
1948 Leaf Jackie Robinson
1951 Bowman Mickey Mantle
1952 Topps Willie Mays
1952 Topps Jackie Robinson
1965 Topps Mickey Mantle PSA 8

David--

Thanks for the Clarke!  Payment on the way.

PM sent on Evers Portrait 

Thanks!
Brian
An e-mail has been sent Thank you.
